resources.string: Please enter a valid email address!
We encountered an unexpected problem, please try again later or contact with us.
Ivocabo firmly believes that privacy is a fundamental human right that must be respected.
As Ivocabo, you can review how we process your personal data and your rights regarding your data by visiting the link below in our Privacy Policy.
Device internet is disconnected! Please check internet connection
Device is connecting with cellular data, this service may overcharge your communication quota!
Please fill below form, cause we only communicate with your given data.
We undertake that the data you register with this form will not be shared with third parties and will be protected.
Please enter a username you can remember!
Please enter a password you can remember!
Account already exists for this username.

Allow Ivocabo to access your location to provide accurate information and improve your experience with our location-based services. We utilize location tracking to keep track of the last known location of the Ivocabo device even when it goes out of range. This helps us ensure that we can provide you with relevant notifications and updates when you are in proximity to the beacon. Rest assured that your location data will only be used within the app and will not be shared with any third parties. Your privacy and data security are our top priorities.

Since you do not allow location access, you will not be able to access the last location information when the device is disconnected! We recommend that you give the location permission in the settings.
You won&t be able to get the exact location data where your connection to your stuff is lost because you don&t allow a very precise location request.
To notify you in the background when your Ivocabo device connection has been lost.
Please input all form fields completely.
Some of your devices on your track list could not be found. They will be removed from the track list and the last location where they could not be found has been recorded.
This event form can not initialize. Please try again. Error Code:502
Your lost device has been successfully registered in our system.
Your device has been successfully removed from the lost list because you found your lost device.
An error occurred during the lost device registration process. Error code 120
Please check your item or switch to Tracking mode to confirm its location.
If you do not remember password please click Reset Password button.
Please check your emails, find and fill the reset form that send from Ivocabo to given at the email to reset your password.
Why do we need Location Service permission?
We will always store your last known location & historical Location Information and use it for improving and personalizing our Services only upon your explicit consent.
Why do we need Bluetooth Service permission?
Ivocabo needs a bluetooth connection to tell you where it is.
Why do we need Notification Service permission?
To receive notifications and updates from Ivocabo, you need your consent.
Why do we need Tracking permission?
Ivocabo needs Tracking permission for out of range alerts.
